content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

I think that's wise, I think the important part is having something to start iterating on. Without a testable hypothesis it can be hard to tell whether we're moving in the right direction. I'm reminded of this [software-centric] quote:

> Without requirements or design, programming is the art of adding bugs to an empty text file.
> 
> -- Louis Srygley

I think there's probably a happy medium somewhere and I'm currently feeling like I'd like *more* planning rather than less.
